channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
Heresy? Blasphemy? Christian fascism? This is from the company that reportedly sold the murderer his gun. https://t.co/sKMAQI6OyS
Note that this murderous misuse of scriptures is not considered a sin by the Southern Baptist Convention or by the Catholic Church, which does not withhold communion to politicians who enable mass murder.
But those bodies, like their Jewish equivalents, privilege the clergy who prey on children above the children who are preyed upon.
They claim to speak for God, but their God always seems to endorse their power.
@YairDaar The Supreme Court hasn’t yet invalidated regulations on nuclear materials, so we might be able to keep the nukes out of teenagers hands for a bit.
@HeerJeet @nycsouthpaw Backpack nukes.
@Green_Footballs Backpack nukes.
@owillis @NRA @GOP Suitcase nukes woulda stopped him.
@lionel_trolling If only! But it’s far worse. (The Metaverse, however, is this.)
@process_better @SethGreen @DarkWing84 Remind me, if I get Dall-E access, that I’d love to storyboard this show for you.
The only thing that can stop a bad guy with a rifle and body armor is a good guy with suitcase nukes. https://t.co/cjfx4XMjPl
@sudgut @JeffSharlet No, they won’t. See what happened in Australia and Scotland after mass shootings there. Take the guns away.
@DemocraticLuntz It wouldn’t take 14 assassinations to rebalance the Supreme Court and overturn the filibuster.

Is there any interpretation of Joe’s helpless “When will we…?” pleas as other than a call for stochastic terrorism? Because I don’t see any concrete calls for action in this tweet. https://t.co/TpFbcEegzH
@hondanhon Dare the Republicans to fillibuster a bill allowing open carry in the Supreme Court gallery.
@Shmarya And: Start calling Republicans and their enablers baby killers.
@johnastoehr Also: Their theological leaders sincerely believe it is better for a child to die and go to heaven then to grow up and possibly become gay and go to hell.
I suppose I’m a bad Zionist for dissing on this AIPAC-endorsed-and-funded Moloch-worshipping turd. https://t.co/eQn0bwPDK7
@JeffSharlet Time for Pelosi and Schumer to introduce bills to legalize open carry in the Supreme Court gallery.
This. And then vote to legalize Open Carry in the Supreme Court gallery. https://t.co/VChGur34b8
Time to legalize guns in the Supreme Court gallery.

@arlenparsa I wonder what would happen if everyone who tried to enter the Supreme Court in the run-up to their forthcoming Second Amendment decision expected to eviscerate my state's gun laws was packing.
@trekonomics “True wonks” Remind me not to annoy Mr. Heer.
@trekonomics Hard to believe someone educated at a university that catered to Christian slavers could lack a moral compass.
@datadivajf And Putin’s Russians.

@maimonides_nutz Ask them nicely once in the name of neighborliness. Then tell them they’re a chilul Hashem and their rudeness reflects poorly on their religion. Finally donate to the Church of Saran in their name.
@maimonides_nutz Satan. Saran Wrap is arguably evil too, but it lacks the ability to give you a tax deduction.
@MisfitTorah Well, they wouldn’t have been baptized so they would be stuck in limbo. Now they’re with Jesus, so it’s a net gain. #BadTheologyKills
